Class UserSettings

java.lang.Object
Settings
UserSettings
public class UserSettings extends Settings
Class representing userSettings. A child class of Settings It manages settings related to the user's profile

    • editSettings

      public void editSettings(User currentUser, AppSettings applicationSettings)
      Edits the settings for the current user. Provides a menu to change the monthly or yearly income.
      Specified by:
      editSettings in class Settings
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The user whose settings are being edited.
      applicationSettings - The application settings object.
